alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 7:35PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bradford and northeastern Alachua Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 733 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gainesville Airport, or 9 miles northeast of Gainesville, moving southeast at 5 mph. This storm continues to produce heavy rainfall between Brooker and Waldo where 2 to 3 inches have already fallen. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Sampson and Brooker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
